alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 12 at 9:41AM HST until January 13 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ..HIGH WIND WARNING FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS EXTENDED UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING CANCELLED FOR HALEAKALA SUMMIT... ...WIND ADVISORY CANCELLED FOR LOWER ELEVATIONS OF THE BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 60 to 80 mph with gusts near 90 mph. Winds will begin to gradually diminish overnight tonight. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
